channel.title: tech on Ravi Sawlani
channel.description: Recent content in tech on Ravi Sawlani

item.title: Work From Home Setup
item.description: Background Growing as a kid in a generation where computers and laptops were not so common, I was always fascinated and wanted to surround myself with digital devices. I still remember I had my first computer when I was in fifth grade. Now working as a software developer has its advantages, one of them being, you work with cool digital devices. Setup Due to the pandemic, most of the software developers are working from home.
